Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Authorizes the dormitory authority to provide additional services to local governments and the department of environmental conservation
Summary: Authorizes the dormitory authority to provide additional services to local governments and the department of environmental conservation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to authorizing the dormitory authority to provide additional services to local governments and the department of environmental conservation
